resources.string: You entered an empty password! We can keep it like this, but it\'s dangerous for you, so we won\'t :(
You entered an empty nickname! We really want to know your nickname so that we can contact you with good news later!
Failed to connect to the server! Please check your internet connection or try later :/
The server said that there is no such account :0 ! Please check the entered data
\"An unknown error has occurred.\" - that\'s what they usually say when they don\'t know what the error is. And that\'s exactly how it is now .-.
